game.name: The Glued
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The peg doll faces from your childhood bedroom reappear at every turn. Struggle to find a path forward through your own personal hell in this bleak visual novel with light puzzles and point-and-click elements.
